page.title: 03Englesea Brook
page.content: Engesea Brook is a little place.It has a chapel which is being turned in to a museum in the methodist church on the life of John Wesley. There is one post office and a shop in the same building,it is run by Mr Spencer Dean.There is no bus stop the nearest one is almost two miles away at Bartomley or at or at Weston.There are thirty houses in the village and Snape Farm is mostly a dairy farm with some arable and it used to be a P.O.W.camp in the second world war.All the Nissan huts are still furnished.There are four farmers in the village with some arable.
